Translations.Text: Ur ippunefk ara i umdan, ad as Immeslay Oebbi, siwa aweeei, ne$ deffir ucembir, ne$ a d iazen amazan iwumi ara Iweeei, s tsrie iS, ayen Ib$a. Ih, Neppa d Aalayen, d Bab n uuwab
Akka ik d Nweeea ooue, si lameo nne£; ur telliv d win issnen d acu p Tezmamt, ne$ liman. Maca, nerra p d tafat. Yis Nenehhu win i £ ihwan, seg imdanen nne£. Ih, d Kecc i ippawin d ubrid uwqim
abrid n Oebbi, i Isaan i illan di tmurt, i illan deg igenwan. War ccekk, ar Oebbi ay teddun lumuo
Em
S Tezmamt ipbegginen
Nerra p d Leqwoan s taaoabt, amar a pfehmem
Neppa, ih, ata $uone£, ar Tyimmap n Tezmamt, d aalayan, d uuwib
Day a kwen Neewwej seg usmekti, imi kunwi d agdud ipeawalen
Aceal id Nuzen d nnbi i imezwura
Ur ten id ippas nnbi, mebla ma mmaalken fellas
Nemea wid i ten yifen tazmert. U iuao umedya imezwura
Ma testequav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan"? A d inin, war ccekk: "Ixelq iten Uzmir, Amusnaw
i wen Irran tamurt d ddue; i wen Igan, degs, iberdan - amendeo ma a ppeppwanhum
id Isse$layen, seg igenni, aman s lmizan - Nessakway yissen tamurt immuten; akka ara d tekkrem
id Ixelqen akw tiyugiwin, i wen Ifkan, si sfinat akked lmal, ara trekbem
A paanncem $ef iarar nnsen; sinna, a d tesmektim l$it n Mass nnwen, mara paanncem fellasen. A ppinim: "gedha s Win i d Inuben fella$ s waya, ur t nemlik
Ih, a nu$al ar Mass nne
Eesben ay T iaabden d amur segS. Amdan, s tidep, d anekkao n uuee
Ne$ day d Iddem tullas seg wayen Ixleq, u Ifren awen d arrac
Ma ibbwev ed usali yiwen segsen, $ef wayen id ifka d amedya i Uenin, ad yibrik wudem is, ad ikkufer
ayen d ikren di rreue, ur nessifrir anamer
Eesben lmalayek, i illan d ixdimen n Uenin, d nnta. Day eevoen i uxlaq nnsent? Tira $ef ccada nnsen; fellasen asteqsi
Nnan: "lemmer Irad Uenin, yili ur ten naabbid". Ur sain kra n tmusni $ef waya. Nitni la pxeooiven kan
Ne$ Nefka yasen Tazmamt, uqbel Tagi, d$a, degs, iifen
Xaii! Nnan: "nufa d, ih, imezwura nne$, di laaqida. D$a, nekwni, Nedda di lateo nnsen
Am akka, ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddao ar temdint, mebla ma nnan isaiyen is: "nufa d imezwura nne$ di laaqida. D$a, nedda d lateo nnsen
